S

saveFullHierarchyToFile() - Method in class vfsCore.Core
save the hierarchy to the currently opened VFS .dsk file
saveHierarchyToFile(Hierarchy) - Method in class vfsCore.CoreIO
Allows us to save a hierarchy object in a .dsk file, without damaging the data already stored in it.
searchFile(String) - Method in class vfsCore.Core
returns an array containing all the Files objects whose name is equal to the string given as an argument
SearchVisitor - Class in vfsCore.visitors
The SearchVisitor allows us to find any File contained in a Hierarchy, and which name is similar to a string passed at initialization time.
SearchVisitor(String) - Constructor for class vfsCore.visitors.SearchVisitor
Constructor
setAddress(long) - Method in class vfsCore.File
 
setchildren(ArrayList<Hierarchy>) - Method in class vfsCore.Folder
 
setName(String) - Method in class vfsCore.Hierarchy

setSize(long) - Method in class vfsCore.File
 
sizeOfDisk() - Method in class vfsCore.CoreIO
returns the size of the vfs partition, in bytes
sizeOfFolder(File) - Method in class vfsCore.CoreIO
Returns the size of a folder, recursively browsing its sub-folders and files, on the host file system
SizeVisitor - Class in vfsCore.visitors
The SizeVisitor is designed to calculate the size of any given Hierarchy, taking into account all its subfolders and files.
SizeVisitor() - Constructor for class vfsCore.visitors.SizeVisitor
